arts.ttl: Brighton duo and Fulham defender eyed for bargain free transfers by European giants
arts.sum: Ajax are planning to strengthen their defensive options this summer and they're already exploring the possibility of signing a number of out-of-contract Premier League stars

arts.ttl: Forest's top-four hopes dented after narrow defeat at Fulham
arts.sum: Fulham handed Nottingham Forest their second defeat in three Premier League games as they triumphed 2-1 at Craven Cottage. A change in shape midway through the second half saw Forest assert some control in the game but Fulham held on to register their third win from four league matches.

arts.ttl: Gatti rejected Nottingham Forest offer as new Juventus contract details emerge
arts.sum: Premier League high-flyers Nottingham Forest reportedly presented Juventus centre-back Federico Gatti with a lucrative contract...

arts.ttl: Dion Dublin shares what he thinks Nuno Espirito Santo will do in Nottingham Forest training this week
Fulham 2-1 Nottingham Forest: Nuno Espirito Santo suggests formation regret after Craven Cottage defeat
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest head coach Nuno Espirito Santo hints that he has regrets over his formation for Saturday's 2-1 defeat at Fulham in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva reserves praise for â€˜almost unstoppableâ€™ Adama Traore in Fulham win
arts.sum: The Cottagers continued their fine form with goals from Emile Smith Rowe and Calvin Bassey against Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: 'One team in control' - Silva praises Fulham dominance
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva says he is pleased with the way his players showed dominance and quality in their controlled 2-1 win over Nottingham Forest at Craven Cottage.
